participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring new places and spending quality time with her loved ones.
participant_1.background: I'm really happy that my partner and I are going strong, and I'm excited to see what the future holds for us. I went to the beach with my family and we had a blast! I love the freedom of riding my motorcycle, and I look forward to one day taking my kids on rides with me. I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself. I am a geology major at Alabama University.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and playful, Jake enjoys discovering new things and has a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I am ten years old and my family is like a library. I live in a nice attic apartment in Portland, OR. I go running a lot. I play for the Baltimore Orioles. My favorite French fries are from McDonald's.

content.text: Hey! I'm a geology major at Alabama University. What's your favorite thing to do outside?
I love going running! It's a great way to stay in shape, and it's also a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I used to run a lot, but I haven't been as active lately. I should really start running again.
You should! It's so much fun. What's your favorite thing to do outside when you're not running?
I love going to the beach. I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
I love the beach too! I live in Portland, Oregon, so we're pretty close to the coast. I go to the beach all the time in the summer.
That's awesome! I'm from Alabama, so we're not as close to the beach. But I try to go as often as I can.
I wish I could live closer to the beach. It's so beautiful and relaxing.
It is! I love spending the day at the beach.
Do you have any family in Alabama?
Yes, I have a big family in Alabama. I'm really close to them.
That's great! I love spending time with my family too.
Me too! I'm really glad that I have a close family.
